keyword: how many calories are in dum dum lollipops
title: How Many Calories in Dum Dum Lollipops?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Dum Dum lollipops per piece, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for quick reference.
h1: How Many Calories in Dum Dum Lollipops?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop, one piece (~5 g), hard candy on stick, assorted flavors, no fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and size; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Dum Dum lollipop has about 25 kcal, mostly from 6 g of sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Dum Dum lollipop?
Do Dum Dum lollipops have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, they are 0 g protein and 0 g fat, all calories from carbs.

faqs.q: How much sugar in Dum Dum lollipops?
faqs.a: 6 g of sugars per lollipop, which is the main carb source.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie Dum Dum options?
faqs.a: Yes, sugar-free versions have about 5 kcal each.

faqs.q: How many Dum Dums in a typical serving?
faqs.a: One lollipop is standard, but a bag serving might be 3-4 for 75-100 kcal.
